summary: There is something special and unique that lies deep in the Silvercrest Tomb. Something that has been lost for a centuries. Something so powerful that only a true hero with the voice can find and keep whats inside this tomb. Dovahkiin, the dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
-Watch the video in Videos section-
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg703/scaled.php?server=703&filename=silvercresttomblogo2.jpg&res=landing[/img]

[size=4][color=black]- I N C L U D E S -[/color][/size]

[b][color=grey]-Silvercrest Tomb
-Watchtower
-Two Caves 
-Halls Of Arongath 
-Silvercrest Dragonpriest\'s Hall
-New Custom made Boss - Arongath
-Arongath\'s Treasure Room 
-Traps 
-Dovahkiin Dragonplate Armor (reduces shout cooldown by 20%)
-Armored Dovahkiin Robe, Hood And Boots (Every piece reduces shout cooldown by 20%)
-Sword Of Dovah
-Lots Of Enemies
-Lots Of Lootable and Valuable Items
-Potions
-Incredients
-Spellbooks
-Weapons
-Armors
-Many Crafting And Enchanting Tables.[/color][/b]

[youtube]GRSunHrv23w[/youtube]  [youtube]C4h1dFgI1ao[/youtube]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg62/scaled.php?server=62&filename=descriptionlogoi.jpg&res=medium[/img]
[b]There is something special and unique that lies deep in the Silvercrest Tomb. Something that has been lost for a centuries. Something so powerful that only a true hero with the power of the voice can find and keep whats inside this tomb. Dovahkiin, the dragonborn.[/b]

[b]Silvercrest Tomb and the Watchtower is located near Riverwood. Across the river.[/b]

[b]This tomb is especially for those who like to explore big dungeons and find some nice stuff, fight with some draugrs, slash spiders and slay a dragon priest. This tomb is filled with danger,  many many places to explore, lots of things to loot, lots of valuable items and weapons, potions, treasure chests, soulgems, traps and things like that. There is many secret corridors and rooms, enchanting and crafting tables. 
There is also a small cave in the tomb.


Halls Of Arongath:

Inside these halls, many people have died by the hand of Arongath\'s. The man with demon eyes and power of Thu\'um. 
The cruel Madman Arongath is almost unstoppable. He is even quite of a challenge for the Dragonborn. Arongath is very powerfull and skilled enemy, so you are gonna need more than just a sword to beat him.
He is keyholder of the treasure room. If you manage to beat him, you have deserved the treasures that lies behind that room.
Use the power of the Dragonborn to finish him and collect your reward.[/b]

[color=red][b]Prepare yourself to the fight of your life![/b][/color]


[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg827/scaled.php?server=827&filename=intallationlogo.jpg&res=medium[/img]

Before installing, save your game outside of the dungeon if you are currently saved your game inside of it. Also make sure that you have installed the latest Skyrim update - 1.5.

-Download the file. If you have older version of the mod, delete it or overwrite data. 
-Extract the content of the downloaded Zip file into your Skyrim/Data folder. 
-Play the game.

-This mod is also uploaded on Steam Workshop-




[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg805/scaled.php?server=805&filename=creditslogo.jpg&res=medium[/img]

[color=green]WarriorKeKe[/color]
